title: Olympic National Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do                   Backpack the Coastal Wilderness.               Connect to Nature: Attend a Ranger Program               Fishing in Olympic: What you need to know.                Climb the Olympics.               Uncover History: Visit Kestner Homestead.               Pets in the Park.                  Boating With Rivers, lakes, and coasts, Olympic has a place for paddlers and motor boat enthusiasts.           Camping Plan your camping trip and stay at one of Olympic's 16 campgrounds.           Climbing Are you a mountaineer? Learn about summiting Olympic's peaks and wilderness trip planning.           Day Hikes and Walks Plan an exciting day hike or short walk on one of the many trail options in the park.           Fishing Fishermen can enjoy their favorite pastime in all seasons at Olympic.            Night Sky Programs Away from the city lights, join a ranger and gaze up at Olympic's starry skies.           Ranger Programs Explore Olympic's diverse ecosystems and history with a ranger during scheduled programs.           Tidepooling Home to colorful sea stars and anemones, discover Olympic's tidepools on your own or with a ranger.           Wildlife Viewing Interested in encountering wildlife in the wilderness? Learn about the best places to see animals in the park.           Winter Activities Ski, snowshoe, and climb during Olympic's winter months.
